from manim import *

class VectorIntro(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Set up number line
        number_line = NumberLine(
            x_min=-10, x_max=10,
            unit_size=2,
            number_of_marks=5,
            mark_to_number_mappings={
                2: "$2$",
                4: "$4$",
                6: "$6$",
                8: "$8$",
            }
        )

        # Set up vector
        vector_label = Tex("v", font_size=25).shift(0.5 * RIGHT)
        vector_end = 5 * RIGHT
        vector_start = ORIGIN
        vector_config = Arrow(
            vector_start, vector_end,
            buff=0.2,
            stroke_width=3,
            color=YELLOW
        ).add_label(vector_label)

        # Set up shrinking vector
        shrunk_vector_end = 2 * RIGHT
        shrunk_vector_config = vector_config.copy().shift(
            shrunk_vector_end - vector_end
        )

        # Display all objects
        self.play(
            Create(number_line),
            Create(vector_config),
        )
        self.wait(1)
        self.play(
            vector_config.animate(
                target=(vector_start, shrunk_vector_end)
            ),
        )
        self.wait(1)

        self.play(
            Uncreate(number_line),
            Uncreate(vector_config),
        )

from manim import *

class MatrixVectorMultiplication(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Define the matrix
        matrix = Matrix([
            [3, 2, 7],
            [6, 9, 1]
        ])

        # Define the vector
        vector = Matrix([
            [2],
            [5]
        ])

        # Define the number line
        number_line = NumberLine(
            x_min=-10, x_max=10,
            unit_size=2,
            number_to_track_decimal_places=2
        )

        # Define the arrow
        arrow = Arrow(
            number_line.number_to_graph(0),
            number_line.number_to_graph(5),
            color=BLUE,
            stroke_width=3,
            buff=0
        )

        # Animate the arrow shrinking
        self.play(
            Create(matrix),
            Create(vector),
            Create(number_line),
            Create(arrow),
            run_time=2
        )

        self.play(
            arrow.animate(end=number_line.number_to_graph(2)),
            run_time=2
        )

        # Animate the multiplication
        self.play(
            Transform(vector, matrix.column(1)),
            run_time=2
        )

        self.wait(1)

from manim import *

class VectorMatrixMultiplication(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Define the matrix
        matrix = Matrix([[-3, 2],
                         [5, 1]])

        # Highlight the first column of the matrix
        matrix.get_entries()[0].set_color(YELLOW)

        # Define the vector
        vector = Vector(
            [1, 2],
            stroke_color=BLUE,
            stroke_width=4,
            stroke_opacity=1,
            fill_opacity=0,
            color=BLUE,
            fill_color=BLUE,
            length=2,
            unit_size=1.5
        )

        # Define the resulting vector
        result_vector = Vector(
            [1, 6],
            stroke_color=GREEN,
            stroke_width=4,
            stroke_opacity=1,
            fill_opacity=0,
            color=GREEN,
            fill_color=GREEN,
            length=2,
            unit_size=1.5
        )

        # Create a title
        title = TextMobject("Vector Matrix Multiplication",
                            font_size=20,
                            weight=BOLD)
        title.to_edge(UP)

        # Create a subtitle
        subtitle = TextMobject("Matrix x Vector",
                              font_size=16,
                              color=YELLOW)
        subtitle.next_to(title, DOWN)

        # Arrange the matrix and vector
        matrix_vector_group = VGroup(matrix, vector).arrange(RIGHT, buff=1)
        matrix_vector_group.to_edge(RIGHT, buff=1)

        # Arrange the result vector and matrix
        result_matrix_vector_group = VGroup(result_vector, matrix).arrange(RIGHT, buff=1)
        result_matrix_vector_group.to_edge(LEFT, buff=1)

        # Show the title and subtitle
        self.play(
            Write(title),
            Write(subtitle)
        )

        # Show the matrix, vector, and resulting vector
        self.play(
            Create(matrix_vector_group),
            Create(result_matrix_vector_group)
        )

        # Animate the vector being multiplied by the first column
        self.play(
            vector.animate(rate_func=linear, run_time=2).move_to(result_vector)
        )

        # Wait for a bit
        self.wait(1)

        # Remove the matrix, vector, and resulting vector
        self.play(
            Uncreate(matrix_vector_group),
            Uncreate(result_matrix_vector_group)
        )

        # Remove the title and subtitle
        self.play(
            Unwrite(title),
            Unwrite(subtitle)
        )

from manim import *

class VectorRotation(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        plane = NumberPlane()
        vector = arrow((0, 0), (3, 4), color=YELLOW)
        origin = dot((0, 0), color=YELLOW)
        circle = Circle(radius=0.2, color=YELLOW)
        circle.move_to(origin)

        matrix = matrix([[-1, 0], [0, 1]])
        matrix_label = matrix.get_entries_labels()

        self.play(Create(plane), run_time=0.5)
        self.play(Create(vector), Create(origin), run_time=0.5)
        self.play(Create(circle), run_time=0.5)

        self.play(Transform(origin, matrix), run_time=0.5)
        self.play(Transform(vector, matrix), run_time=0.5)
        self.play(Write(matrix_label), run_time=0.5)

        self.wait(1)

        rotated_vector = arrow((0, 0), (-4, 3), color=YELLOW)

        self.play(Transform(vector, rotated_vector), run_time=0.5)

        self.wait(1)
